files.patch:
@@ -62,1 +62,1 @@
-compress.argument=<0|1|2>[:filter=<pattern-list>]
+compress.argument=<0|1|2|zip-[0-9]>[:filter=<pattern-list>]
@@ -65,6 +65,9 @@
-Compress all resources in the output image.\n\
-Level 0: No compression\n\
-Level 1: Constant string sharing\n\
-Level 2: ZIP.\n\
-An optional <pattern-list> filter can be specified to list the pattern of\n\
-files to be included.
+Compression to use in compressing resources:\n\
+Accepted values are:\n\
+zip-[0-9], where zip-0 provides no\n\
+compression, and zip-9 provides the\n\
+best compression. Default is zip-6.\n\
+Deprecated values:\n\
+0:  No compression. Equivalent to zip-0.\n\
+1:  Equivalent to --compact-constant-pools\n\
+2:  Equivalent to zip-6.
@@ -73,2 +76,1 @@
-\  --compress <0|1|2|zip-[0-9]>[:filter=<pattern-list>]\n\
-\                            Compress all resources in the output image.\n\
+\  --compress <compress>     Compression to use in compressing resources:\n\
@@ -76,1 +78,1 @@
-\                            Zip: zip-[0-9], where zip-0 provides no\n\
+\                            zip-[0-9], where zip-0 provides no\n\
@@ -78,9 +80,5 @@
-\                            best compression. Default is "zip-6".\n\
-\                            Level 1: Constant string sharing\n\
-\                            An optional <pattern-list> filter can be\n\
-\                            specified to list the pattern of \n\
-\                            files to be included.\n\
-\n\
-\                            DEPRECATED:\n\
-\                            Level 0: No compression\n\
-\                            Level 2: ZIP.
+\                            best compression. Default is zip-6.\n\
+\                            Deprecated values:\n\
+\                            0:  No compression. Equivalent to zip-0.\n\
+\                            1:  Equivalent to --compact-constant-pools\n\
+\                            2:  Equivalent to zip-6.
@@ -332,4 +330,9 @@
-\  -c, --compress=<0|1|2>                Enable compression of resources:\n\
-\                                          Level 0: No compression\n\
-\                                          Level 1: Constant string sharing\n\
-\                                          Level 2: ZIP
+\      --compress <compress>             Compression to use in compressing resources:\n\
+\                                        Accepted values are:\n\
+\                                        zip-[0-9], where zip-0 provides no\n\
+\                                        compression, and zip-9 provides the\n\
+\                                        best compression. Default is zip-6.\n\
+\                                        Deprecated values:\n\
+\                                        0:  No compression. Equivalent to zip-0.\n\
+\                                        1:  Equivalent to --compact-constant-pools\n\
+\                                        2:  Equivalent to zip-6.
